title: The Ultimate Inner Self Link Up: Discover the Real You Guided Meditation
description: This remarkable meditation is open to everyone and will open the gateway that will give you the secret keys to make the personal changes that allow you to achieve the things you desire in life.In this audio from the The Ultimate series, international best-selling mind power author Stephen Richards has developed one of the most powerful ways to help you discover and connect to the real you â€“ your inner self - through this guided meditation. Now you can begin to take back your life when you link up to your inner self that will help you create the life that you deserve. Beneath the mask you have worn for so many years, get in touch with your authenticity and discover what is often hidden even from you. When you connect to your inner self you will, at last, be the individual you always wanted to be and take back your inherent right to be happy within.
author: Stephen Richards
